```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(tidymodels)
library(tidyr)
library(tidyverse)
```


```{r}
data(diamonds)
diamonds <- diamonds |> 
    slice_head(n = 1000)
```

```{r}
# 1
moneydiamonds400 <- diamonds %>%
  filter(price<400)
```

```{r}
# 2
moneydiamonds500600 <- diamonds %>%
  filter(price>500, price<600) 
```

```{r}
# 3
moneydiamondscut <- diamonds %>%
filter(cut == c("Fair", "Premium", "Ideal"))
```

```{r}
moneydiamondscut <- diamonds %>%
filter(cut %in% c("Fair", "Premium", "Ideal"))
```
